00056 // SBWHandle.h: interface for the SBWHandle class.
00057 //
00059 
00060 #if !defined(AFX_SBWHANDLE_H__3540512C_45D8_448B_9111_619845A580CA__INCLUDED_)
00061 #define AFX_SBWHANDLE_H__3540512C_45D8_448B_9111_619845A580CA__INCLUDED_
00062 
00063 #if _MSC_VER > 1000
00064 #pragma once
00065 #endif // _MSC_VER > 1000
00066 
00067 #include "portableOS.h"
00068 
00069 namespace SystemsBiologyWorkbench
00070 {
00071 
00073 template <class T>
00074 class SBW_API SBWHandle
00075 {
00076 public:
00077         typedef T _PtrClass;
00078 
00080         SBWHandle() {p=NULL;}
00081 
00087         SBWHandle(T* lp)
00088         {
00089         assert(lp!=(LPVOID) 0xdddddddd);
00090                 if ((p = lp) != NULL)
00091                         p->AddReference();
00092         }
00093 
00099         SBWHandle(const SBWHandle<T>& lp)
00100         {
00101         assert(lp.p!=(LPVOID) 0xdddddddd);
00102                 if ((p = lp.p) != NULL)
00103                         p->AddReference();
00104         }
00105 
00109         ~SBWHandle() {if (p) p->Release();}
00110 
00114         void Release() {if (p) p->Release(); p=NULL;}
00115 
00120         operator T*() const {return (T*)p;}
00121 
00126         T& operator*() {assert(p!=NULL); return *p; }
00127 
00132         T* operator->() { assert(p!=NULL); return p; }
00133 
00134         // T* operator=(T* lp){return (T*)AtlComPtrAssign((IUnknown**)&p, lp);}
00135 
00143         T* operator=(const SBWHandle<T>& lp)
00144         {
00145                 assert(lp.p!=(LPVOID) 0xdddddddd);
00146         // in ATL it's
00147                 //return (T*)AtlComPtrAssign((IUnknown**)&p, lp.p);
00148 
00149                 if (lp.p)
00150                         lp.p->AddReference();
00151 
00152                 if (p)
00153                         p->Release();
00154 
00155                 p = lp.p ;
00156 
00157                 return (T *)p ;
00158         }
00159 #if _MSC_VER>1020 || defined(LINUX)
00160         bool operator!(){return (p == NULL);}
00161 #else
00162         BOOL operator!(){return (p == NULL) ? TRUE : FALSE;}
00163 #endif
00164 protected:
00166         T* p;
00167 };
00168 } // SystemsBiologyWorkbench
00169 #endif // !defined(AFX_SBWHANDLE_H__3540512C_45D8_448B_9111_619845A580CA__INCLUDED_)
